attributes.action: Demand afull national investigation into child sex abuse and sex gangs in the UK
attributes.additional_details: Conduct a full national investigation into child sex abuse and sex gangs in the UK. Hold all accountable including those who have ignored and covered up this scandal
attributes.background: Conduct a full national investigation into child sex abuse and sex gangs in the UK. Hold all accountable including those who have ignored and covered up this scandal

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
